title: ECP appoints DO, ROs, AROs for LG elections in ICT
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 8 (APP):The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) on Thursday appointed Districts Returning Officer (DO), Returning Officers (ROs) and Assistant Returning Officers (AROs) for the conduct of local government elections in Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT).
The ECP appointed DO, ROs and AROs in exercise of the power conferred upon it under Articles-140 A(2) and 219 (d) of the constitution, section-20 of the Islamabad Capital Territory Local Government Act, 2015 read with Rule-8 of the Islamabad Capital Territory Local Government (Conduct of Elections) Rules, 2015, said a notification issued here.
Irfan Nawz Memon, Deputy Commissioner (ICT) has been appointed as DO, Muhammad Amer Mumtaz, Principal IMCB, F-11/1, Muhammad Anwar, Principal IMSB, Noor Pur Shahan, Dr Ehsan Mehmood, Area Education Officer Barakahu, Uzair Ali Khan Assistant Commissioner (Nilore), Iftikhar Ahmad Hashmi, Principal IMSB Sihala, Aziz ur Rehman Principal IMCB Humak, Kamran Saghir Assistant Commissioner (Rural) ICT, Rasheed Ahmad, Principal IMSB (VI-X) Tarlai Islamabad, Nehal Hafeez Assistant Commissioner (Shalimar), ICT, Farwa Batool, Assistant Commissioner (Industrial Area), Dr Muhammad Yaseen Afaqi, Principal ICB, G 6/3, Amer Naeed, Assitant Director (Labour), Shahid Mahmood Abbasi, Principal IMCB, I 8/3, Asma Sanaullah, Director (AES), Dr Javed Iqbal, Principal IMSB (I-X) Nogazzi and Raheela Awais, Area Education Officer, Tarnol as ROs, it further said.
Similarly, Dr Zafar Iqbal, Principal IMCB Shah Allah Ditta, Syed Talat Mehmood Shah, Assistant Director Livestock, Arif Masih, Vice Principal IMSB Malwar, Abdul Raziq, Assitant Director, Department of Libraries, Dr Khursheed Alam Khan, Principal IMSB, Rawal Dam, Ghulam Murtaza, Assistant Director (Department of Libraries), Muhammad Khalid, Vice Principal IMSB, Thanda Pani, Syed Riaz Ali Shah, Naib Tehsildar, Fazal Mehmod, Principal IMSB Rajwal, Umar Farooq Mirza, Development Officer Rural Development, Muhammad Irshad SST Sihala, Wajid Ali, APS, Junaid Ahmad, Principal IMCB, Pahag Panwal, Ch Manzoor Ahmad, Naib Tehsildar, Syed Azhar Abbas, SST Khanna Dak, Khurram Kabir, Food Safety Officer (Food Authority), Muhammad Shahbaz, Vice Principal, IMSB Ali Pur Farash, Ali Javed, Naib Tehsildar, Abdul Hadi, Naib Tehsildar, Ghulam Abbas, Vice Principal IMSB Khanna Nai Abadi, Sohail Ashraf, Assistant Professor, ICB G 6/3, Syed Saqlain Raza, Assistant Director LG and Rural Development, Mazhar Ali, Community Development Officer, Muhammad Ishaque, Assistant Professor, IMCB F 8/4, Jamil Afzal, SST, IMCB, I-10/1, Zahid Rafique, Project Officer, Salamat Siddiqui, Vice Principal IMSB Chellow, Malik Naseer Ahmad, Naib Tehsildar, Muhammad Zubair Awan, Labour Officer, Kifayat Ullah, Principal IMSB I-14 and Zafeer Ur Rehman, Development Officer as AROs for conduct of the local bodies elections, the notification added.
